name: Ghost on Chain
description:
What's that?

Ghost on Chain is short puzzle-platformer made for GMTK GameJam 2021. The main characters are ghost and man, they are joined together and need to go throw puzzles, to get freedom.

Gameplay

Ghost and can't go too far from each other, actions, that thet can make are also different. Ghost cannot affect physical world, buttons, for examples, but he can do this ghost world. But except from that, that's pretty much classic puzzle-platformer. Have fun!
